title: Quantitative Mastery
description: Comprehensive guide to mastering numerical ability for placements.
roadmap: ["Number Systems & Simplification", "Percentages, Profit & Loss", "Averages, Ratio & Proportion", "Time, Speed & Distance", "Simple & Compound Interest", "Permutation, Combination & Probability"]
notes: Quantitative aptitude is the cornerstone of technical placements. To succeed, focus on two things: Speed and Accuracy.
questions: [{"q": "A can do a work in 15 days and B in 20 days. If they work together for 4 days, what fraction of work is left?", "a": "8/15."}]

title: Dynamic Programming Essentials
description: Learn the art of optimizing recursive solutions using DP.
notes: Dynamic Programming (DP) is often the most feared topic in coding interviews. However, it's just recursion with storage.
questions: [{"q": "What is the core difference between Memoization and Tabulation?", "a": "Memoization is Top-Down, Tabulation is Bottom-Up."}]

title: System Design for Beginners
description: Master the high-level architecture of scalable applications.
notes: In System Design, there is no single 'correct' answer; it's all about tradeoffs.
questions: [{"q": "What is the CAP Theorem?", "a": "Consistency, Availability, and Partition Tolerance."}]

title: Logical Reasoning
description: Sharpen your analytical skills with logical puzzles and patterns.
notes: Logical reasoning tests your ability to structured thinking.
questions: [{"q": "All cats are dogs. No dogs are birds. Can we say some cats are birds?", "a": "No."}]

title: SQL for Data Science
description: Essential data manipulation skills using SQL.
notes: SQL is the bread and butter of data roles.
questions: [{"q": "How do you find the second highest salary?", "a": "Using subqueries or LIMIT/OFFSET."}]

title: HR Rounds: Top 50 Questions
description: Master soft skills and behavioral questions for the final round.
notes: HR rounds check if you are a culture fit.
questions: [{"q": "Why should we hire you?", "a": "Align your skills with the company mission."}]
